text:
e="preserve">Edappadi K. Palaniswami is an Indian politician. He is the current and 8th Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu. He is the chief minister since 16 February 2017. Palaniswami is a senior leader of All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam.
Early life.
Edappadi K. Palaniswamy was born on 12th May 1954. He was born in Siluvampalayam village in Salem district. His father's name is Mr.Karuppa Gounder. His Mother's name is Thavasi Ammal.
Politics.
Palaniswami has won the state assembly elections four times from the Edapadi constituency. He won the elections in the years of 1989, 1991, 2011 and 2016.

annotations.surface_form: All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam
